Name: Verify Navigation to Inventory Page and Adding Item to Cart
Description: Navigate to the inventory page and add the specified item to the cart. Verify the successful navigation to the home page.
Test Steps:
step 1: Navigate to Page_inventory.html
step 2: At Page inventory.html, click on button add to cart sauce labs backpack
step 3: At Page inventory.html, click on hyperlink 2 > navigate to Page home
step 4: Add visual checkpoint at Page_home

Name: Verify Login and Access to Cart Page

step 1: Navigate to Page_home
step 2: At Page home, click on input user name
step 3: At Page home, input on input user name
step 4: At Page home, input on input password
step 5: At Page home, click on input login button > navigate to Page inventory.html
step 6: At Page inventory.html, click on hyperlink object > navigate to Page cart.html
step 7: At Page cart.html, click on div object
step 8: At Page cart.html, click on button react burger menu btn
step 9: Add visual checkpoint at Page_cart.html

Name: Verify Checkout Process and Completion
Description: Navigate to the inventory page and add specified items to the cart. Proceed to checkout, enter the required information, and complete the checkout process. Verify the successful completion of the checkout.
Test Steps:
step 1: Navigate to Page_inventory.html
step 2: At Page inventory.html, click on button add to cart sauce labs backpack
step 3: At Page inventory.html, click on button add to cart sauce labs bolt t shirt
step 4: At Page inventory.html, click on hyperlink 2 > navigate to Page cart.html
step 5: At Page cart.html, click on button checkout > navigate to Page checkout-step-one.html
step 6: At Page checkout-step-one.html, click on input firstname
step 7: At Page checkout-step-one.html, input on input firstname
step 8: At Page checkout-step-one.html, click on input lastname
step 9: At Page checkout-step-one.html, input on input lastname
step 10: At Page checkout-step-one.html, click on input postalcode
step 11: At Page checkout-step-one.html, input on input postalcode
step 12: At Page checkout-step-one.html, click on input continue > navigate to Page checkout-step-two.html
step 13: At Page checkout-step-two.html, click on button finish > navigate to Page checkout-complete.html
step 14: At Page checkout-complete.html, click on div object
step 15: At Page checkout-complete.html, click on button react burger menu btn
step 16: Add visual checkpoint at Page_checkout-complete.html
